com.loopj.android.jpush.http

类 BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler<JSON_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loopj.android.jpush.http.AsyncHttpResponseHandler
      • com.loopj.android.jpush.http.TextHttpResponseHandler
        • com.loopj.android.jpush.http.BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler<JSON_TYPE>
  • 类型参数:
    JSON_TYPE - Generic type meant to be returned in callback
    所有已实现的接口:
    ResponseHandlerInterface

    public abstract class BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler<JSON_TYPE>
extends TextHttpResponseHandler
    Class meant to be used with custom JSON parser (such as GSON or Jackson JSON)

     

    parseResponse(String, boolean) should be overriden and must return type of generic param class, response will be then handled to implementation of abstract methods #onSuccess(int, org.apache.http.Header[], String, Object) or #onFailure(int, org.apache.http.Header[], Throwable, String, Object), depending of response HTTP status line (result http code)

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 com.loopj.android.jpush.http.AsyncHttpResponseHandler

        BUFFER_SIZE, CANCEL_MESSAGE, DEFAULT_CHARSET, FAILURE_MESSAGE, FINISH_MESSAGE, PROGRESS_MESSAGE, RETRY_MESSAGE, START_MESSAGE, SUCCESS_MESSAGE, UTF8_BOM

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler()
      Creates a new JsonHttpResponseHandler with default charset "UTF-8"
      BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler(java.lang.String encoding)
      Creates a new JsonHttpResponseHandler with given string encoding

      Called when request fails
      abstract void onFailure(int statusCode, Header[] headers, java.lang.Throwable throwable, java.lang.String rawJsonData, JSON_TYPE errorResponse)
      Base abstract method, handling defined generic type
      void onSuccess(int statusCode, Header[] headers, java.lang.String responseString)
      Called when request succeeds
      abstract void onSuccess(int statusCode, Header[] headers, java.lang.String rawJsonResponse, JSON_TYPE response)
      Base abstract method, handling defined generic type
      protected abstract JSON_TYPE parseResponse(java.lang.String rawJsonData, boolean isFailure)
      Should return deserialized instance of generic type, may return object for more vague handling

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler

        public BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler()
        Creates a new JsonHttpResponseHandler with default charset "UTF-8"

      • BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler

        public BaseJsonHttpResponseHandler(java.lang.String encoding)
        Creates a new JsonHttpResponseHandler with given string encoding
        参数:
        encoding - result string encoding, see Charset

    • 方法详细资料

      • onSuccess

        public abstract void onSuccess(int statusCode,
             Header[] headers,
             java.lang.String rawJsonResponse,
             JSON_TYPE response)
        Base abstract method, handling defined generic type
        参数:
        statusCode - HTTP status line
        headers - response headers
        rawJsonResponse - string of response, can be null
        response - response returned by parseResponse(String, boolean)

      • onFailure

        public abstract void onFailure(int statusCode,
             Header[] headers,
             java.lang.Throwable throwable,
             java.lang.String rawJsonData,
             JSON_TYPE errorResponse)
        Base abstract method, handling defined generic type
        参数:
        statusCode - HTTP status line
        headers - response headers
        throwable - error thrown while processing request
        rawJsonData - raw string data returned if any
        errorResponse - response returned by parseResponse(String, boolean)

      • onSuccess

        public final void onSuccess(int statusCode,
             Header[] headers,
             java.lang.String responseString)
        从类复制的说明: TextHttpResponseHandler
        Called when request succeeds
        指定者:
        onSuccess 在类中 TextHttpResponseHandler
        参数:
        statusCode - http response status line
        headers - response headers if any
        responseString - string response of given charset

      • onFailure

        public final void onFailure(int statusCode,
             Header[] headers,
             java.lang.String responseString,
             java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        从类复制的说明: TextHttpResponseHandler
        Called when request fails
        指定者:
        onFailure 在类中 TextHttpResponseHandler
        参数:
        statusCode - http response status line
        headers - response headers if any
        responseString - string response of given charset
        throwable - throwable returned when processing request

      • parseResponse

        protected abstract JSON_TYPE parseResponse(java.lang.String rawJsonData,
                      boolean isFailure)
                                    throws java.lang.Throwable
        Should return deserialized instance of generic type, may return object for more vague handling
        参数:
        rawJsonData - response string, may be null
        isFailure - indicating if this method is called from onFailure or not
        返回:
        object of generic type or possibly null if you choose so
        抛出:
        java.lang.Throwable - allows you to throw anything from within deserializing JSON response
